entry.title: [48 pack] [Net 10 oz/Pack] Premium Moisture Absorber Box [Charcoal]
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dry & Dry
Type:
Price: 104.99

  • [Purpose of Usage] Freshens room air by eliminating musty odor caused by excess moisture; Protects clothes and items from excess moisture damage.
  • [Place of Usage] Designed to use in closets, basements, cabins, bathrooms, garages, laundry rooms, and other enclosed spaces.
  • [Safe to Use] Does not dry air extremely to the point to cause damage to plants, furniture, or any household items; Does not emit any toxic gas or fume.
  • [Premium Quality] Lasts up to 60 days (Duration will vary depending on temperature and humidity); Witness the effectiveness as absorbed moisture will collect in the lower chamber of the box.
  • [How They Work] The white beads swell and become solid mass as they absorb moisture; Once they become completely solidified, they will start to release liquid in the lower part; They may take time, but it does not mean they are not working.

 

Instruction 

1. Remove the lid of the product and peel off the sealed aluminum foil under the lid to activate the product. 
2. Do not break or peel off the non-woven fabric which is beneath the aluminum foil cover.
3. Place the lid onto the box and place the box on a flat surface.  The box will begin to work in absorbing moisture in the air. 
4. When the crystals have completely dissolved into water, discard the product and replace.

Note: It is common to find crystal powders in the lower chamber after opening.

entry.title: Dry & Dry Premium Silica Gel for Flower Drying Desiccant - (Net 3 LBS)
entry.summary:
Vendor: n/a
Type: Desiccant, Moisture Absorber
Price: 18.99

Net 3 LBS "Dry & Dry" High Quality Pure White Silica Gel Desiccant(1 bag of 3 lbs) 

  • Preserve Elegant Memories and Capture Beauty of Drying flowers with Dry & Dry Premium Silica Gel Beads(Beads are stored in Air Tight Sealed Bag for Long-term Preservation & Protection)
  • Gently soak the flowers into Silica gel beads not to damage them.(Net 3 LBS)
  • Flowers can be dried in 2-5 days. Maintains natural Colors. Preserves Texture.
  • Beads can be Reactivated by Placing in the Oven for 0.5-2 hours at 200-250F Or Microwave for About 10 Minutes at DEFROST. Don't use over 250F in the Oven. Depending on beads' condition, they may take shorter than the recommended time.

entry.title: 1/2 Gallon Premium Blue & White Mixed Indicating Silica Gel Beads(Industry Standard 2-4 mm) - 3.6 LBS Reusable
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dry & Dry
Type:
Price: 19.99

30 Year Experience in the Industry for Silica Gel Desiccant - Premium Quality(See Our Customers' Reviews)

"High Quality Mixed Blue & White Indicating Silica Desiccant" 

  • Contains 90% of White Beads and 10% Blue Beads.
  • Half Gallon Volume of Fresh Mixed Blue & White High Quality Silica Gel Beads(Approx 3.6 lbs)
  • Silica Gel Beads Size : about 2 ~ 4 mm
  • Indicating Silica Gel will turn Blue to Pink when 50-60% absorbed with moisture. Still almost half more capacity left to absorb moisture even after color change.
  • Blue Beads contain "COBALT CHLORIDE" which may pose health risk and environmental issues. Our blue beads contain less than 0.3% cobalt chloride
  • Beads can be Reactivated by Placing in the Oven for 0.5-2 hours at 200-250F Or Microwave for About 10 Minutes at DEFROST. Don't use over 250F in the Oven. Depending on beads' condition, they may take shorter than the recommended time. Please check the beads' color periodically.
  • NOT FOR FOOD 
  • GOOD FOR Air Compressors, Paint Booths, Gun Moisture Control, 3D Filament, Drying Woods, Desiccant Drying Air Compressor, Gun Safe and Tank Dries

Free Shipping

entry.title: [12 pack] [Net 14 oz/Pack] “Dry & Dry” Premium Hanging Moisture Absorber to Control Excess Moisture for Basements, Bathrooms, Laundry Rooms, and Enclosed Spaces
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dry & Dry
Type:
Price: 33.99

  • - Designed to use in closets, basements, cabins, bathrooms, garages, laundry rooms, and other enclosed spaces.
  • - Freshens room air by eliminating musty odor caused by excess moisture. Protects clothes and items from excess moisture damage.
  • - Does not dry air extremely to the point to cause damage to plants, furniture, or any household items. Does not emit any toxic gas or fume.
  • - Lasts up to 60 days (Duration will vary depending on temperature and humidity) - Witness the effectiveness as absorbed moisture will collect in the lower part of the bag.
  • - 12 Packs [Net 14 oz/Pack]  - Each absorber is stored in each bag for easy use and long term storage. Active Ingredients: Calcium Chloride

Instruction 
1. Open the package right before the use. 
2. Use the hook to hang the moisture absorber and allow enough space for air circulation. 
3. White crystals will absorb moisture in the air and become water and accumulate in the lower part of the bag. 
4.When the crystals completely disappear, it’s time to replace the hanging moisture absorber. 
5. Discard the whole bag in trash while holding the bag upright. 
6. Caution: Avoid direct eye or skin contact. Do not eat. Keep out of reach of children and pets. 

Note: It is common to find crystal powders in the lower bag after opening.
